## Dataset Setup

```{r}

# set working directory
#setwd("C:/Users/krist/OneDrive/Documents/R/project-final-The-Null-Wranglers")

# read in data
study_data <- read.csv("data/study_data.csv")
summary(study_data)
```
```{r, warning=FALSE}
# How time affects classes (columns AH to AM) for different colleges? - Anjani

# Filter the data for the specified colleges
selected_colleges <- c("College of Agric and Life Sci", "College of Social & Behav Sci", "Eller College of Management", "College of Humanities", "College of Science")
filtered_data <- study_data[study_data$College %in% selected_colleges, ]

# Create separate plots for each time slot
time_slots <- c("Early_Morning", "Mid_Morning", "Early_Afternoon", "Mid_Afternoon", "Evening", "Asynchronous")

plots_list <- lapply(time_slots, function(slot) {
  ggplot(filtered_data, aes_string(x = "College", y = slot, fill = "College")) +
    geom_bar(stat = "identity", position = "dodge") +
    labs(title = paste("Total number of classes students attended in ", slot, "by Different colleges"),
         x = "Colleges", y = "Number of Classes Attended") +
    theme_minimal() +
    theme(axis.text.x = element_text(angle = 45, hjust = 1))
})

# Print individual plots
for (i in seq_along(plots_list)) {
  print(plots_list[[i]])
}
```
